channel.title: TILs on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in TILs on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Static Blogs
item.description:
How to blog from your text editor

Today I Learnt (TIL) that you can make blogging a simple relationship between you and your text editor. No more navigating through admin portals and writting in WYSIWYG forms. Just your text editor (your favorite interface) and you. I’m just discovering Hugo, which seems to be markdown based, file based and simple enough to be git versioned.
